title: Chocolate cake
ingredients: ['2 eggs', '200g (7oz) caster sugar', '2 tablespoons butter, softened', '250g (9oz) vegetable oil', '50g (2oz) cocoa powder', '125ml (4 fl oz) buttermilk', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '275g (10oz) plain flour', '1 1/2 teaspoons baking powder', '1 1/2 teaspoons bicarbonate of soda', '1/4 teaspoon salt', '250ml (8 fl oz) boiling water', '175g (6 oz) plain chocolate chips', 'Buttercream Chocolate Icing', '125g (4¼oz) butter, softened', '125g (4¼oz) icing sugar', '50g (2 oz) cocoa powder', '1 teaspoon vanilla extract', '2 tablespoons milk', '1 tablespoon strong brewed coffee']
